It's my understanding that Sagara Souzou (a Satsuma retainer and headquarte=
red at the mansion with the Soumou Roushitai) burned down the Satsuma mansi=
on to blame the bakufu before he & as many of his men as could reach the Sa=
tsuma warship escaped Edo.  If M (or anyone else who can translate Japanese=
) will take a look at this site, maybe we can get some possible clarificati=
on:  http://www1.ocn.ne.jp/~oomi/tokusyu14.htm
